sources.title: The 13th Cross | Full Action Thriller Movie | True Story
sources.description:
The 13th Cross - A man with a troubled past seeks to atone for his sins by acting as a hitman for a religious organization by killing those who have committed the unforgivable sin of harming innocents. 
2020.  Stars: Eric Wood, Chelsea Jurkiewicz, Melanie Browning
